id: Schedules/3.1 Conditions for Registration of a Consent Manager/Conditions for Registration of a Consent Manager
title: Conditions for Registration of a Consent Manager
description: To qualify for registration, a Consent Manager must meet specific standards. These are meant to ensure technical robustness, financial stability, and organizational credibility.
